content.question: In lines 1-3 (“I stood . . . world”), personification primarily has the effect of

choices.label: revealing a troubling aspect of an everyday concept
illustrating a whimsical fantasy through human interactions
transforming a natural process into a series of intentional actions
depicting a scientific event in terms of psychological perceptions

content.answer: transforming a natural process into a series of intentional actions

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
